titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Record Group Vertical Files, 1960s-present
titlestmt.subtitle: Record Group Vertical Files VerticalFile.005

publicationstmt.date: Â© 2013 By Virginia Tech. All rights reserved.

titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections VerticalFile.005

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Record Group Vertical Files must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: [Item-specific information], Record Group Vertical Files, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Newman Library staff began collection materials for vertical files during the 1960s. Special Collections staff add to existing files and continue to create new files as the need arises.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: In general, vertical files at Special Collections include newspaper clippings, photocopies, ephemera, unpublished and/or informal publications, and other papers relating to a specific subject area. Files in this collection relate to Virginia Tech and its history. Topics may include, but are not limited to: colleges and departments, student organizations, administrative offices, centers and other campus units, and athletics. Each topic below has at least one folder and many include cross references.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Vertical files in this collection are arranged by record group. Within each record group, files are arranged by subgroup.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Please note: Vertical files do not include official records of the university. For more information about official records in the University Archives, consult the online guide or contact Special Collections.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Virginia Agricultural and Mechanical College
Virginia Agricultural and Mechanical College and Polytechnic Institute
Virginia Polytechnic Institute
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
